content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, a pleasure to meet you. Let's not waste any time. I am looking to rent out this apartment for 1200 Euros. Remember, I am not obligated to share any additional information about the apartment, so let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for presenting the initial price. While I understand the value of this newly built apartment in the city center, I must consider my budget as a student. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower monthly rent, say around 1050 Euros? I assure you my commitment to maintaining the apartment and following ethical standards will be impeccable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 1050 Euros is simply not acceptable. I am looking for a higher price to compensate for the prime location and condition of the apartment. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective on the apartment's premium features. However, as a student, my financial capabilities are limited. Could we explore a middle ground around 1100 Euros per month? I'm certain this well-maintained apartment will be a great fit for my needs, and I will uphold all my responsibilities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I am still not satisfied with the price you are offering. However, I am willing to continue negotiations. Please remember, I am aiming for the highest possible price for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your openness to continue discussing the matter. Given my financial constraints as a student, I would like to reiterate my proposal of 1100 Euros as a reasonable compromise. I am confident that this apartment will be an excellent match for my requirements while remaining within my budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I have considered your proposal, and I am willing to accept your offer of 1100 Euros. Remember, this is the final price that we will agree upon. 'I agree to the price of [1100] Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
